summary: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.
cast: Matthew Broderick|Denzel Washington|Cary Elwes|Morgan Freeman|Jihmi Kennedy|Andre Braugher|John Finn|Donovan Leitch Jr.|JD Cullum|Alan North|Bob Gunton|Cliff De Young|Christian Baskous|RonReaco Lee|Jay O. title: Tiempos de gloria
